nodes.bodyText: Looks like there's a label missing for this input. That makes it hard for people using screen readers or voice control to use the input.

Bit of funky spacing going on here!
Small thing, but I'd just compress this onto one line, unless you want to check email service for null.
Imports seem to have jumped around a bit here. Could you keep them in more or less the same place? It makes it easier for the branch manager, (ie: Earle!) to merge.

commit.message: SAK-43035 funky spacing, check email service for null, ToolUtils: patch -R
